description:
Mumei is confined in a classroom full of traps. 
Trying to escape along with his comrades, they set off the traps and are sent to another world.
A strange old man was waiting there. 
Mumei`s classmates exhaust themselves without skills going up against an enemy that gets stronger the more he drinks.
A sense of foreboding reaches the bewildered Mumei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coup bas ! Réussir l’examen préliminaire avec le sourire !
Foul Play! An Old Examiner Grins!
Hiretsu! Rou Shikenkan wa Niyari to Warau!
卑劣! 老試験官はニヤリと笑う!
